name: DHRUV JANI
company_address: SURVEY NO. 491, KARNAVATI CLUB ROAD,, MUMATPURA, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, 380058
my_business: Seven11 Sports & Cafe is a 24x7 recreational and community hub located in near SG Highway, Ahmedabad. Designed to promote active lifestyles, social engagement, and all-day accessibility, the facility combines premium sports infrastructure with quality vegetarian dining — all under one roof.
top_product: Our box cricket turf. It is not just a pitch — it is a space that brings people together. You will see birthday laughter and office rivalries play out on the same field. It is well-lit, well-run, and has a certain warmth to it. People book it once, and usually come back with more friends next time.
ideal_referral: Someone in HR or admin who is juggling a hundred things and just wants a place where the team can unwind - no fuss, no chaos. Maybe they have done the bowling alley thing, tried a resort once, and now want something different, closer to the city, yet not corporate in vibe. If you know someone like that, I would love to talk.
top_problem_solved: A lot of workplaces struggle with low engagement - people just clock in and clock out. What we offer is a break from that routine. A space that does not feel like work, yet quietly builds teamwork, morale, and connection. It is simple, but powerful - and honestly, we need more of that today.
my_favourite_bni_story: There was a moment when someone I barely knew from the chapter messaged me, saying: “Hey, I have got a team looking for something informal but well-managed — thought of you instantly.” That hit home. It was not about a sales pitch or a flashy presentation. It was about being remembered when it mattered. That is what BNI’s about for me.

name: RUSHIL PANDYA
company_address: 46/ Hastinapur Society, Near Navrang school, Jagatpur Road, Jagatpur, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, 382470
my_business: My business, Fitness Hustler, is dedicated to empowering individuals to achieve their ultimate health and fitness goals. We provide personalized coaching in fitness, nutrition, and sleep optimization, guiding clients through comprehensive programs tailored to their unique needs and lifestyles. Our mission is to transform health by building sustainable habits that lead to lasting vitality, strength, and confidence.
top_product: My signature 'Fit Gujarati' program, a specialized coaching experience crafted for busy Gujarati businessmen. This comprehensive program integrates personalized fitness plans, culturally relevant nutritional strategies, and advanced sleep optimization techniques to drive sustainable weight loss, boost energy, and enhance overall well-being and focus.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a Gujarati businessman who feels overwhelmed by his busy schedule and wants to prioritize his health by losing weight, improving his diet, and optimizing his sleep. He's ready to invest in a sustainable transformation and would benefit from a structured, personalized plan.
top_problem_solved: I solve the persistent problem of people feeling lost and confused about how to truly live healthy. I empower my clients by teaching them not just what to eat and how to train, but why certain choices lead to lasting well-being. This transforms their frustration into sustainable success, clarity, and confidence in making healthy decisions for life.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite BNI story began even before I joined, when I visited the chapter as a guest. I was immediately struck by how genuinely members helped each other's businesses grow, embodying 'Givers Gain' to the core. Seeing that tangible commitment to mutual support and how people celebrated each other's successes, convinced me that this was the right community for me. It showed me that true business growth comes from lifting others up, a principle I now live by and apply in my own practice to help my clients achieve their health goals.
